Text: how do i use the keygen??
yes, sir, how to use the keygen?

First off do you have java installed? if you don't, then you wont be able to run the 4MediaAll.jar file. So go and download java(use Google), install it and double click the 4MediaAll.jar file it should open up the keygen, from the drop down list choose DVD Ripper Ultimate( WIN) now click Generate and it should generate a valid Serial, now you need to register the app so for the User Name use any name and for the License Code use the generated serial. Enjoy!!!
